overview: Shawn oversees uShip’s Global Expansion from strategy to implementation including identifying and prioritizing opportunities by country, adapting uShipâ€™s unique value proposition to fit each market, evaluating businesses in target countries for partnerships or acquisitions, and managing the operations of each global property. The uShip Global Team focuses on increasing the footprint of the uShip platform, tools and ultimately the value that it creates for customers, transportation companies and partners through localization, targeted marketing and support. Shawn began his involvement with the company shortly after the service was launched while getting his MBA at the McCombs School of Business at the University of Texas at Austin and joined full time in 2005, leading the Product Team until mid 2010. Prior to uShip Shawn founded the Cambridge Web Design Group and then joined BigBad, Inc. to lead large scale web solutions for clients ranging from Southern New England Telephone to Harvard University. Shawn continued to contribute to the evolution of the web by interning at Pluck Corporation, one of the earliest companies focused on web collaboration through RSS aggregation and blogging tools. In addition to his MBA, Shawn has an A.B. in Religion & Archaeology from Bowdoin College.

degrees.institution: McCombs School of Business, The University of Texas at Austin

milestones.description: Joined the Board of Directors of TeXchange.
